participant_1.background:
I am a chef.
I like to garden.
I like to bake pies.
I love traveling.

participant_2.background:
I never have had alcohol in my life.
I currently suffer from social anxiety.
I have a girlfriend of 7 years.
I am a geology major at alabama university.

content.text: What's up?
Not much, just working on my geology homework.
Oh, that's cool. I'm a chef, so I like to cook.
That sounds fun! I love to bake pies, but I'm not very good at it.
Pies are delicious! I've never tried to make one, but I'd love to learn how.
It's pretty easy, actually. You just need to follow a recipe and have a little bit of patience.
I'll keep that in mind. I love to try new things.
So, what's your favorite thing to cook?
I love making pasta dishes. There are so many different ways to make pasta, and it's always delicious.
I love pasta too! I make a really good lasagna.
Lasagna is one of my favorites. I love the layers of cheese and sauce.
Me too! I always make a big batch of lasagna so I have leftovers for lunch the next day.
That's a great idea! I love having leftovers.
Yeah, they're the best. So, what are you doing this weekend?
I'm not sure yet. I might go to the farmer's market or visit my family.
The farmer's market sounds fun. I love trying new fruits and vegetables.
Yeah, me too! I always find something new to try at the farmer's market.
So, what are you looking forward to the most this year?
I'm looking forward to going on vacation. I'm going to Hawaii with my family.
That sounds amazing! I've always wanted to go to Hawaii.
It's so beautiful there. I can't wait to see the ocean and the mountains.
Me too! I'm sure you'll have a great time.
